alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:13AM CST until January 27 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road affecting Montgomery County. For the West Fork San Jacinto River...including Porter, Sendera Ranch Road, Conroe, Humble, Sheldon...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 137.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 129.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 142.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 138.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 142.1 feet on 04/19/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Lake Creek Sendera Ranch Roa 138.0 137.3 Wed 9 am CST 142.0 139.6 137.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM CST.
